DocConstant.Name: VIENNESEBEND
DocConstant.Documentation:
Non linear cant variation according to Viennese bend base formula. The determining influence of the cant variation for the curve in the horizontal Cartesian 2D coordinate space is unique within all other transition curves.

.**Base formula (Cant)** !["Viennese Bend(R) cant transition segment"](../../figures/ifcalignmentcantsegmenttypeenum-viennesebend.png "Figure 1 — Cant for Viennese Bend(R) transition segment")
